## About 

Hello World!

My name is Ruixuan Zhang (张 瑞轩), a Ph.D. student in Kyoto University, a member belonging to Ogata Lab.

Currently, I am hired as a JSPS DC2 Research Fellow.

***Research Interests***

I am interested in host-virus interaction and the evolution behind their billion-year war. I use multi-omics to reveal the virus infection strategy.
